name: deprecated_html_tags
description: Detects usage of deprecated HTML tags that should be replaced with semantic HTML5 alternatives or CSS. Includes tags like <center>, <font>, <marquee>, <blink>, etc.
author: Website Analyzer Team
notes: These tags are deprecated in HTML5 and should be replaced with semantic HTML or CSS alternatives. For example: <center> -> use CSS text-align or flexbox, <font> -> use CSS color property, <strike> -> use <del> or <s> tag.
